overview:
Edward focuses on sourcing investment opportunities and due diligence. His investment experience has included many University spinouts, primarily in the life sciences sector but also including nanotechnology and software. He is non executive director of Domainex Ltd and Biotronics 3D Ltd.

Edward graduated from Oxford University and joined BZW where he worked in the investment management and equity capital markets divisions. He left to join KPMG in Birmingham where he qualified as a Chartered Accountant. From 2002 until the establishment of Longbow Capital he was an investment executive and Finance Director at an early stage venture capital firm in London.
